duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead material planning, forecasting, and readiness for new product development and technology development.
Manage multiple or alternate source qualifications through build management.
Work closely with Engineering, Operations, Finance, Procurement, and Supplier/Manufacturing Partner(s) to ensure smooth coordination.
Propose optimized supply planning to ensure on-time build schedule.
Lead NPI materials process improvement and drive closure of materials issues.
Lead clear to build (CTB) for pre-production build phases.
Lead daily or weekly supply planning meetings with Manufacturer Partners.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA with 1-3 years or comparable professional experience
